Description of incident: On September 1, 2011, a spreadsheet containing information on 19,276 students was accidentally made accessible from the internet due to a administrative error.  The spreadsheet contained the names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, majors, class or classes, levels, colleges, student ID numbers, and GPAs of students enrolled as of September 1 of 2011.  The problem was corrected on November 2 soon after it was discovered. The spreadsheet had been accessed 15 times by unknown parties between September 1 and November 2.
